videos.title: One clean up repo, ready for project
videos.description: Got a messy repo? Start with a new branch as a "backup" of existing code so you can use it if needed but get a fresh start.

videos.title: Starting on a project
videos.description: Cumbie starting to organize code fragments into getting sequence: trash, keep, fix.

videos.title: Git workflow (CLI)
videos.description: The git workflow: clone (pull) & add/commit/push. Instead of downloading GitHub ZIPs, use git from the command line interface.

videos.title: Getting the repo in order & app direction
videos.description: Organizing an existing repository and discussing overall application direction and structure.

videos.title: Getting input from the DOM with JavaScript
videos.description: How to capture and work with user input from the DOM using JavaScript.

videos.title: Establishing a JavaScript session
videos.description: Introduction to setting up and working with a JavaScript session.

videos.title: array to dom part one
videos.description: stepping through how to use your script to load data into the html dom from an array.

videos.title: array to dom part 2, conclusion
videos.description: conclusion of stepping through how to use your script to load data into the html dom from an array.
